titleStmt.title: Mr. Pim's speech, deliverd at a conference betvvixt both Houses, concerning divers petitions presented to the House of Commons hee being appoynted to manage that conference. Ianu. XXV. M.D.CXLI.
Speech delivered at a conference with the Lords. January, XXV. MDCXLI.
titleStmt.author: Pym, John, 1584-1643.

titleStmt.title: Mr. Pim's speech, deliverd at a conference betvvixt both Houses, concerning divers petitions presented to the House of Commons hee being appoynted to manage that conference. Ianu. XXV. M.D.CXLI.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication conjectured by cataloger; date of publication from Wing.
This edition of Pym's speech does not include the two orders of the House of Commons printed with other editions.
Year in title given according to Lady Day dating.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
